review_data.title: For meatlovers
review_data.content: The Schlachthof restaurant is more beautiful from inside that it looks from outside. Especially the chalet-style part of the restaurant is nice. They are famous for their Riesencordonbleu.

review_data.title: Шлачтоф
review_data.content: Типичный немецкий ресторан. Безупречный интерьер, даже зайти посмотреть и то стоит. Грамотное обслуживание, хорошее разнообразие меню, различные деликатесы. Удивило малое...More

review_data.title: Gutes Essen aber zu gross

review_data.title: gutes Essen
review_data.content: Der Schlachthof ist ein rustikales, sehr einfach gehaltenes Restaurant. Das Essen war gut, aber nicht mehr. Ich hatte Käsespätzle, welche...More

review_data.title: Great fondue, great meal
review_data.content: Ask for a seat in the "more typical Swiss" area if you want fondue.,, it is a separate section of the restaurant, decorated in the more traditional style. Staff was attentive, food was great.

review_data.title: Lecker Riesenschnitzel
review_data.content: Leckeres großes Schnitzel und keine lange Wartezeiten. Die anderen Gerichte fallen etwas kleiner aus. Preise sind ok für Schweizer Verhältnisse....More

review_data.title: Fondue!
review_data.content: We were in Zurich for Fondue and we found it in the "extra special Swiss section" I kid you not! they have one section for their regular menu and the Swiss section for Fondue! the portions are huge! and the food is great! Just do...More

review_data.title: Cordonbleu
review_data.content: Gutes währschaftes essen. Cordonbleu wie auch die Pommes sehr gut. Menüs nicht sonderlich speziell. Service freundlich jedoch nicht allzu aufmerksam.

review_data.title: Hält von innen mehr, als es von aussen verspricht

review_data.title: Fantastic venue, fantastic food and even better service !
review_data.content: We selected this restaurant as it is conveniently located around the corner of the Crown Plaza Hotel. We went there with 18 people. They had reserved a number of tables in a separated cozy room. the management had even prepared a menu with our company's...More

review_data.title: Excellent Swiss food!
review_data.content: Amazing Swiss food close to Crown Plaza hotel where we were staying. You have to try the veal schnitzel, veal cordon bleu, and spetzli as a side dish. Also the wurst-case (meat and cheese) salad with greens is very tasty and satisfying. Friendly service. The...More

review_data.title: The worst I've ever been
review_data.content: Худшее из всех мест Цюриха. Пришел сегодня вечером, заказал фондю и вино. Вино официант принес сразу, салат (стартер) через пол...More

review_data.title: Great Schnitzels!
review_data.content: Been here twice, only ever had the *huge* schitzel which is excellent! Well cooked, not greasy, the meat is moist, not dry and it's served with paprika seasoned fries. It goes well with a draft Schneider weisse-bier and is very good value for Zurich at...More

review_data.title: Sehr Gemütlich

review_data.title: могло быть лучше

review_data.title: Good food, good price
review_data.content: The Schlachthof provides very good local specialties at relatively low prices (considering the Zurich standard). Meat specialties are best (they also have some vegetarian food, but nothing special), good choice of beer. Don't expect white linens and candles here and also not nicely decorated plates....More

review_data.title: Bürgerliche Küche zu fairen Preisen
review_data.content: Sehr zu empfehlen ist das Gasthaus "Schlachthof", wenn man die bürgerliche Küche bevorzugt. Große Portionen werden zu fairen Preisen serviert....More

review_data.title: Enjoyable Evening - Very Reasonably Priced
review_data.content: For our last night in Switzerland we went in search of Fondue - as this restaurant was conveniently located neared Letzigrund stadium and our hotel Crowne Plaza Zurich ( we went to See the wall @ the stadium ) it was an obvious choice and...More

review_data.title: Generous portions, modest price
review_data.content: If you are suffering from the high prices in Zürich here's an alternative. It's a bit hidden away behind a stadium and the terrace seating is not really fancy, facing busy street traffic. I had a salad which was huge, with all kinds of different...More

review_data.title: Grosse Schnitzel gut bürgerlich aber Dessert Karte komplett falsch

review_data.title: The Real Deal
review_data.content: This was a typical locals place. lots of TV's with sport on, but not a sports pub. Nobody could speak English, which was strange for Switzerland. Good pub fare and good beer.
